quizz_info_1: 5CB, discovered by George Gray, has revolutionized the world we live in. It was the first liquid crystal to display a bright and clear color display at room temperature. This discovery led to the display screens which are now found in our homes (televisions, clock radios, e-readers, phones, etc). Liquid crystals are a matter of states which has both the properties of liquids (it may flow like water) and solids (the molecules can be oriented like in a diamonds).
quizz_info_2: For more details on this synthesis, see: Mol. Cryst. Liq. Cryst. 1980, 58, 251-259. For more information about how liquid crystals displays work, see: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0B79dGR19Tg

cards.condition: H2N-NH2•H2O, KOH, ethylene glycol, 130 °C, 3 h, then 220 °C
HIO3, I2, CCl4, conc. H2SO4, acetic acid/H2O, 80 °C, 10 h
